modShortDescription: Return to the classic 7 Days to Die experience and say goodbye to Joel, Jen and the gang! This 7DTD mod removes traders and deletes challenge quests.
modDescription:
Return to the classic 7 Days to Die experience and say goodbye to Joel, Jen and the gang! This 7DTD mod removes traders from random world generation and deletes challenge quests since there are no [traders](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/) to turn them in to. Gold and silver nuggets (useless without a trader) have been replaced by useful loot.

Requires a **new game/world** to use it. It appears to break old games that have generated traders, though Aerial is unsure why.

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/o5ttk8da3li3733/NoTraders%20v1.0%20A18%20Modlet.zip?dl=1)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16720-no-traders-a18/).

**Credits:** [Aerial](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/aerial/)
